Detailed Description

An implimentation of FusionPhysicsStatic. Handles bitmask based collisions.

Has functions for removing sections of the bitmask (to be used in collision callbacks of the bodies that can destroy it.)

See also:
FusionPhysicsStatic | FusionPhysicsWorld.

Member Function Documentation

void FusionEngine::FusionPhysicsTerrain::_madeHole (  const CL_Surface *  surface  ) 
 

This is called by the Environment on hole creation.

When the Environment has finished making a hole in the terrain image, it calls this so the FusionPhysicsTerrain will update its bitmask.
